trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> contém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> objetos em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an instance of this class through the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode recuperar uma instância dessa classe por meio do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The collection maintains a reference to the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A coleção mantém uma referência para o controle por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> includes shared and unshared rows.
trans-unit.target: Para melhorar o desempenho, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> inclui compartilhadas e linhas.

trans-unit.source: Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set.
trans-unit.target: Linhas compartilhadas compartilham a memória para reduzir o custo de um grande conjunto de registros.

trans-unit.source: If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible.
trans-unit.target: Se o conjunto de registros é muito grande, seja cauteloso para manter as linhas compartilhadas tanto quanto possível.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que tem o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds one or more rows to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma ou mais linhas à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new row to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma nova linha à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the new row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da nova linha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Add> overload adds rows that are based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Add> sobrecarga adiciona linhas que se baseiam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: The new row is shared, if possible.
trans-unit.target: A nova linha for compartilhada, se possível.

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property can be shared for best scalability.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se que a linha especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> propriedade pode ser compartilhada para melhor escalabilidade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: Linhas no controle não são classificadas automaticamente quando novas linhas são adicionadas.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para classificar novas linhas em sua posição correta, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: Você também poderá chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> manipulador de eventos para classificar as linhas quando o usuário modifica uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new rows from being added:
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> associado está executando uma das seguintes ações, que impedem temporariamente que novas linhas sejam adicionadas:

trans-unit.target: A linha retornada pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate" /> tem mais células do que colunas no controle.

trans-unit.target: O número de linhas a serem adicionadas ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified number of new rows to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o número especificado de novas linhas à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the last row that was added.
trans-unit.target: O índice da última linha que foi adicionada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Add%28System.Int32%29> method adds shared rows to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Add%28System.Int32%29> método adiciona linhas compartilhadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The new rows are based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: As novas linhas se baseiam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property can be shared for best scalability.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se que a linha especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> propriedade pode ser compartilhada para melhor escalabilidade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para classificar novas linhas em sua posição correta, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.

trans-unit.source: Due to a bug, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddRange%2A> method will make your application stop responding if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property is `true` and the row for new records is selected.
trans-unit.target: Devido a um bug, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddRange%2A> método fará com que seu se está respondendo de parada do aplicativo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> é de propriedade `true` e a linha para novos registros é selecionada.

trans-unit.source: To work around this bug, you must cancel the selection of the row before calling this method, and then reselect the row.
trans-unit.target: Para solucionar esse erro, você deve cancelar a seleção da linha antes de chamar esse método e, em seguida, selecione novamente a linha.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example in this topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o exemplo de código neste tópico.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddRange%2A> method when the row for new records is selected to work around the bug indicated in the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddRange%2A> método quando é selecionada a linha para novos registros para solucionar o erro indicado na seção comentários.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> named `DataGridViewRowCollection1`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method adds rows that are based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> método adiciona linhas que se baseiam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: The new row is shared, if possible.
trans-unit.target: A nova linha for compartilhada, se possível.

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property can be shared for best scalability.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se que a linha especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> propriedade pode ser compartilhada para melhor escalabilidade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: Linhas no controle não são classificadas automaticamente quando novas linhas são adicionadas.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para classificar novas linhas em sua posição correta, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: Você também poderá chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> manipulador de eventos para classificar as linhas quando o usuário modifica uma célula.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> é menor que zero ou maior que o número de linhas na coleção.

trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new rows from being added:
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> associado está executando uma das seguintes ações, que impedem temporariamente que novas linhas sejam adicionadas:

trans-unit.source: Selecting all cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: Selecionar todas as células no controle.

trans-unit.source: Clearing the selection.
trans-unit.target: Limpar a seleção.

trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> é igual ao número de linhas na coleção e a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> é definida como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This operation would insert a frozen row after unfrozen rows or an unfrozen row before frozen rows.
trans-unit.target: Essa operação poderia inserir uma linha congelada após as linhas não congeladas ou uma linha não congelada antes de linhas congeladas.

trans-unit.source: The position at which to insert the row.
trans-unit.target: A posição na qual inserir a linha.

trans-unit.target: Um número variável de objetos que populam as células da nova linha.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a row into the collection at the specified position, and populates the cells with the specified objects.
trans-unit.target: Insere uma linha na coleção na posição especificada e preenche as células com os objetos indicados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29> method adds an unshared row to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29> método adiciona uma linha não compartilhada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.

trans-unit.target: Para classificar novas linhas em sua posição correta, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: Você também poderá chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> manipulador de eventos para classificar as linhas quando o usuário modifica uma célula.

trans-unit.source: Due to a bug, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A> method will make your application stop responding if any rows with an index greater than `rowIndex` are selected.
trans-unit.target: Devido a um bug, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A> método fará com que seu se está respondendo de parada do aplicativo as linhas com um índice maior `rowIndex` estão selecionados.

trans-unit.source: To work around this bug, you must cancel the selection of these rows before calling this method, and reselect the rows afterward.
trans-unit.target: Solução alternativa para esse bug, cancelar a seleção dessas linhas antes de chamar esse método e selecionar as linhas posteriormente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example in this topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o exemplo de código neste tópico.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A> method to insert rows before selected rows to work around the bug indicated in the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A> método para inserir linhas antes das linhas selecionadas para solucionar o erro indicado na seção comentários.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Add%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow%29> overload, passing in `value` after casting it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Add%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow%29> sobrecarga, passando `value` depois convertê-la para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: Linhas no controle não são classificadas automaticamente quando novas linhas são adicionadas.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para classificar novas linhas em sua posição correta, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: Você também poderá chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> manipulador de eventos para classificar as linhas quando o usuário modifica uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is bound to an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> implementation with <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove" /> and <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification" /> property values that are not both <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> associado está vinculado a uma implementação <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> com valores das propriedades <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove" /> e <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification" /> que não são <see langword="true" />.
